mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MATCH WHERE STATUS IN ('매칭완료', '결제완료', '정산완료', '결제대기')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MATCH WHERE STATUS IN ('매칭대기')
SELECT SUM(PRICE) AS total_price FROM MATCH WHERE STATUS = '결제완료'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM MATCH WHERE STATUS IN ('매칭취소', '환불완료')

SELECT (ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = '매칭완료' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 2) + ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = '결제완료' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 2) + ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = '정산완료' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*), 2)) * 100 AS confirm_percentage FROM MATCH
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM MATCH WHERE pay_date IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match (id, member_id, num, amount, adm_comment) VALUES (match_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{num}, #{amount}, #{admComment})
mapper.update: UPDATE match SET member_id=#{memberId}, num=#{num}, amount=#{amount}, adm_comment=#{admComment} WHERE id=#{id}
